item.title: arabic and french translation
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Thank you very much for being willing to Support Whonix in such a meaningful way. For Translation on our current wiki to work, it is required for you to create an account on said wiki here. You also might want to look at our Translation guide here. Additionally, for this to work you will require to be added to a Special user Group. For this, please contact me with your wiki user Name at "ego-superego-id@whonix.org". If required, my GPG key may be found on my Profile page.

Have a nice day and thank you very much,

Ego

Read full topic
